name: Description list
heading: Easily create nicely looking description lists, which come in different styles.
description: Add the .uk-description-list-horizontal class to display terms and descriptions side by side.
usage: There is no component class necessary to create a description list, but UIkit provides a couple of modifier classes to display the list in a different style. The modifiers of the Description list component are not combinable with each other. [uk-description-list-line]
